languages.text: {n}Вид-скрин окрашивается россыпью неизвестных зеленых символов, затем вы слышите странный щелчок за спиной — похоже, отворилась одна из дверей в комнате.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вид-скрин окрашивается россыпью неизвестных зеленых символов, затем вы слышите странный щелчок за спиной — похоже, отворилась одна из дверей в комнате.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вид-скрин окрашивается россыпью неизвестных зеленых символов, затем вы слышите странный щелчок за спиной — похоже, отворилась одна из дверей в комнате.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a scatter of unfamiliar green symbols and your hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind. It looks like one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
{n}The vid-screen lights up with a scatter of unfamiliar green symbols and your hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind. It looks like one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
{n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
{n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
{n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}
{n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La videopantalla se ilumina mostrando una serie de símbolos verdes desconocidos y escuchas un extraño chasquido detrás de ti. Parece que se ha abierto una de las puertas de la cámara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La videopantalla se ilumina mostrando una serie de símbolos verdes desconocidos y escuchas un extraño chasquido detrás de ti. Parece que se ha abierto una de las puertas de la cámara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Vid-Bildschirm leuchtet auf, eine ganze Reihe von dir unbekannten grünen Symbolen erscheint, und du hörst von irgendwo hinter dir ein merkwürdiges Klicken. Offenbar hat sich eine der Türen in der Kammer geöffnet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vid-Bildschirm leuchtet auf, eine ganze Reihe von dir unbekannten grünen Symbolen erscheint, und du hörst von irgendwo hinter dir ein merkwürdiges Klicken. Offenbar hat sich eine der Türen in der Kammer geöffnet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'écran s'illumine d'une poignée de symboles verts étranges et vous entendez un clic étrange quelque part derrière vous. L'une des portes de la salle s'est ouverte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'écran s'illumine d'une poignée de symboles verts étranges et vous entendez un clic étrange quelque part derrière vous. L'une des portes de la salle s'est ouverte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}视频屏幕上浮现出了某些陌生的绿色符号。你听到身后传来一阵奇特的咔哒声，看来其中的一扇门已经打开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}视频屏幕上浮现出了某些陌生的绿色符号。你听到身后传来一阵奇特的咔哒声，看来其中的一扇门已经打开了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}スクリーンに見慣れない緑色の記号が点灯して、背後のどこかで奇妙なカチッという音が聞こえた。どうやら部屋の扉のひとつが開いたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-screen lights up with a smattering of unfamiliar green symbols and you hear a peculiar click from somewhere behind you. It appears one of the doors in the chamber has opened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スクリーンに見慣れない緑色の記号が点灯して、どこか後ろで奇妙なカチッという音が聞こえた。どうやら部屋の扉のひとつが開いたようだ。{/n}
{n}スクリーンに見慣れない緑色の記号が点灯して、背後のどこかで奇妙なカチッという音が聞こえた。どうやら部屋の扉のひとつが開いたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Video ekranı, aşina gelmeyen yeşil sembollerle parlıyor. Arkandaki bir yerden tuhaf bir klik sesi duyuyorsun. Galiba odadaki kapılardan biri açıldı.{/n}
